title: Velvet Goldmine
description: The official tie-in to the major motion picture starring Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Ewan McGregor, Christian Bale, and Toni Collete. At the center of the story is Brian Slade, a glam rocker of the '70s whose rise and fall becomes the subject of an expose by a British newspaper reporter thirteen years later.
author: Todd Haynes
